name: Modules.LDAP.SearchResult
summary: Provides access to the result of a search request.

methods.name: countEntries
methods.summary: Retrieves the number of matching entries for the search operation

methods.name: firstEntry
methods.summary: Retrieves the first entry in the search results list. Returns null if there are no entries.

methods.name: nextEntry
methods.summary: Retrieves the next entry in the search results list 9and advances the list pointer/cursor). Returns null if there are no more entries.
